content: Hi Nick, great article as usual. I always like your stuff! A question for you, I’ve seen more talk of “T pattern” browsing as we see more and more sites using that type of layout with centre-based content options (not text so much but on landing pages). For example, I’m looking at: https://www.theplayerstribune.com/ and as you scroll down we see more content that is centered on the screen. They still make use of the F pattern to deliver content within an article. I’m curious what you think about an increased use of the T pattern style and if it represents mobile’s influence on design or something else altogether? Cheers
